caption.title: Correlations between reported prevalence in the WHO patient database and reported prevalence in Red Cross burials of non-hospitalized deaths, in four districts of Sierra Leone: Western Area Urban (the capital district; red circles), Western Area Rural (orange circles), Bombali (blue triangles), and Bo (green squares).
caption.p: Polygons enclose +/- 2 standard errors for Poisson regression of non-hospitalized burial prevalence as a function of WHO reported prevalence (confirmed and probable cases) in each district.
